name: VooDoo Doll Game
description:
A typically 2D physics platformer with a twist. A VooDoo Doll! Throw the doll to propel yourself through the air, increase your jump and running speed, or even control the doll with your movement to reach inaccessible areas.

How to play

Move: press a or d to move left or right
Jump: press w to jump
Sync: press x to sync with the doll. While synced, any physics applied to either you or the doll will be applied to the other.
Grab and throw: press E to pick up anything in the immediate area. Press again to throw anything you have picked up.
